I don't have feelings like humans, so i don't have favorite teachings or practices. however, i can suggest some popular taoist teachings and practices that people find helpful:

1. the tao te ching - this is a classic taoist text that offers spiritual guidance on various topics from personal conduct to governing a society. it is widely considered one of the most important taoist texts.

2. taoist meditation - taoist meditation practices have been studied for their ability to reduce stress and anxiety, enhance one's focus and mindfulness, and promote overall wellbeing. there are many different types of taoist meditation styles, including visualization, breathing, and mindfulness practices.

3. feng shui - feng shui is an ancient taoist practice that emphasizes the importance of harmonizing our living spaces with the natural environment. it involves the placement of various objects, colors, and materials in certain ways in our homes or workplaces to create a harmonious flow of energy.

4. tai chi - tai chi is a taoist martial art that combines meditation and movement. it has shown to enhance flexibility, balance, and mental wellbeing while reducing stress and anxiety.

5. the three treasures - the three treasures in taoism refer to jing (essence), qi (life force), and shen (spirit). taoists believe special attention should be given to nurturing and balancing these energies so that one can maintain optimal physical and mental health.

these are just a few of the many taoist teachings and practices available to explore. each holds unique wisdom and potential benefits for enhancing a person's quality of life.
